text:
Interactive Brokers | Greenwich, CT | Full-Time | On-Site ($75 - 85 + bonus + benefits )

Junior programming position for someone fresh out of college. We are a small team working with Perl and Go in the fast growing industry of Compliance Technology.

We are located in beautiful Greenwich CT, a 45 minute train right to New York City.

Apply online at:

https://careers-interactivebrokers.icims.com/jobs/1501/junio...
